text: Agar naf'i zudhosilşavanda va safari oson meʙud, az paji tu (munofiqon) meomadand, vale aknun, (on ci ʙa on da'vat mekunī ʙa ʙaromadan ʙa çangi Taʙuk), ki masofati roh ʙa onho dur namud va havo garm ast, pajmudanaşro duşvor mehisoʙand. Va ʙa Alloh qasam mexūrand, ki agar metavonistem, hamrohi şumo ʙerun meomadem. Inho tan ʙa halokat mesuporand (ʙo on savgandi durūƣaşon). Alloh medonad, ki munofiqon durūƣ megūjand
